title: NBN Television
summary: NBN Television is an Australian television station based in Newcastle, Australia. The station was inaugurated on 4 March 1962 as the first regional commercial television station in New South Wales,[1] and has since expanded to 39 transmitters throughout Northern New South Wales, including the Gold Coast, Tweed Heads, Lismore, Tamworth, Coffs Harbour, Newcastle, and Central Coast.[2] It is owned and operated by the Nine Network, with regional sales and newsroom located at 28 Honeysuckle Drive.
